title: Mithy vs. Aphromoo JP% - what is JP%?
body:
A head to head comparison came up on the Worlds stream. What is JP%?
I feel like it's something obvious but I have no idea.
It was something like 18-19% for Mithy and 17.34% for Aphromoo.

replies.body:
I believe JP is jungle priority/presence.  They did an analysis of where the jungler is at all times for each team.  Any time the jungler was, I don't know the actual number, 1800 units within a player it counted towards the JP%.  If you had a team that liked to camp for top lane the JP% for the top laner would be really high.

In the context of supports it's talking about the synergy between support/jungle roaming together.  Those numbers are saying that mithy roams more with their jungler than aphro does.

I just spent a very long time trying to look up what it was and this is the only place I have even seen reference to it
Can you please make it more available so the statistics don't just seem random.
I've never heard it. Jungle Presence/Pathing %? Some sort of metric for how often they leave lane?
